The Socceroos’ quest to qualify for next year’s FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ will continue in Melbourne next month, with the Victorian capital today confirmed as Host City for Australia’s next AFC Asian Qualifier.

articles.title: Real Madrid vs. Atletico Madrid - Football Match Report - December 12, 2021 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Get a report of the Real Madrid vs. Atletico Madrid 2021-22 LaLiga football match.
articles.content:
Karim Benzema and Marco Asensio scored as Real Madrid beat Atletico Madrid 2-0 at the Bernabeu on Sunday to move 13 points ahead of their local rivals in the LaLiga table.
